li.a: See it, Say it, Safe Line!

a.style: color: White; text-decoration: none !important; line-height: 1; margin-top: 8px;

a.span: Click here to access school work

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: School Work Moving Forward for Central Middle School

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Starting April 14, students will be expected to use Google Classroom to access, complete, and turn in their assignments. The below links will provide your child with the necessary codes to log in to their teacher’s Google Classroom. If your child has teachers on different teams they will find the links for those teachers under the other team’s link.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

a.span: Click Here for Team Blue Streaks

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

a.span: Click Here for Team Golden Flashes

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Fortunately, most of our students are already familiar with Google Classroom from their experiences in elementary school or while at Central. If your child does need additional support the attached link will provide you assistance to help your child get started. If you still need assistance please DO NOT hesitate to email or to have your child email their teacher. We are here to help.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

a.span: Click Here for A Parent’s Guide to Google Classroom

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

a.span: Click Here to Watch a Video

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Google Account passwords were changed on April 6 to the same password used for accessing the Infinite Campus Portal. As a reminder, this uses the format first initial, last initial, 10 digit student number (ex. dd0001234560). The Google login name has NOT changed–only the password. Students will also use this username and password combination to get into Schoology and Google Classroom.

p.span: filled with additional Euclid links that you may need for your classes.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Our school counselors and our family liaison are all available to assist students and families during our school closure. In the link below, you will find contact information and links that may help your family navigate these difficult times.

span.style: text-decoration-line: underline; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.p: Our teachers are available to give guidance and answer questions over the extended closure. Click here to download a list of teachers' contact information and availability.

span.style: font-size: 16px

span.p: To help facilitate more efficient communication between teachers and students, we will be enabling student email accounts for students grades 6-12, beginning Monday April 6, 2020. Student email accounts will be restricted to only sending/receiving emails to/from other euclidschools.org accounts. All student email activity will be monitored for inappropriate activity.

For additional security, also beginning Monday April 6, 2020, student Google Account passwords will be changed to the same password used for accessing the Infinite Campus Portal. As a reminder, this uses the format first initial, last initial, 10 digit student number (ex. jd0001234560).

br.style: box-sizing: border-box; color: #000000; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-weight: 400; text-align: start; background-color: #fefefe; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial

a.alt: Central Principals, Mr. Coleman, Mr. Mennel, and Mr. Castrilla

img.alt: Central Principals, Mr. Coleman, Mr. Mennel, and Mr. Castrilla

span.div: Central Middle School is home to Our Euclid Schools sixth and seventh-grade students. At Central Middle School we embrace the middle school philosophy to ensure that all students find their unique pathways to success.

div.span: The 2019-2020 bell schedule for Central Middle School students.
The Central Middle School Handbook for the 2019-2020 school year can be accessed by clicking the blue link above.
